name: BLOCKDROP (TOWERNOW GAMES)
description:
TO START THE GAME:

Execute OgoDrop.exe
Press any button in controls to make a player appear in the load screen (the first one).
When ready press the button above to begin!

-----------------------------------------------------

RULES:

Crush your opponents' head with a block to win the match and score a point!

-----------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

PLAYER 1:   W, A, S, D
PLAYER 2:   UpArrow, LeftArrow, DownArrow, RightArrow
PLAYER 3:   F1, F2, F3, F4
PLAYER 4:   F5, F6, F7, F8

Esc: Pause menu

UP: Jump (Hold to jump higher)
DOWN: Place block under player's feet (While airbone, jump just after to kick it down)
SIDES: Walk (If next to a block, double press to kick it)
